      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExecutorService getBuildExecutor()
      Returns a build executor from the pool of build executors.
      ExecutorService getFileCreateExecutor()
      Returns an executor used for asynchronously creating files.

      Returns a scheduled executor that will execute submitted tasks after a delay determined by IOptions.getDeleteDelay().

      Returns a scheduled executor service that fires on a periodic interval.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: IExecutors
        Shuts down the executor services. Any tasks that have been submitted to the delete executor that have not yet been dispatched will be completed synchronously before this method returns.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface IExecutors

      • getBuildExecutor

        public ExecutorService getBuildExecutor()
        Description copied from interface: IExecutors
        Returns a build executor from the pool of build executors. The submitted task runs immediately.
        Specified by:
        getBuildExecutor in interface IExecutors
        Returns:
        An executor service

      • getScheduledExecutor

        public ScheduledExecutorService getScheduledExecutor()
        Description copied from interface: IExecutors
        Returns a scheduled executor service that fires on a periodic interval. Used by the cache manager to periodically serialize cache metadata.
        Specified by:
        getScheduledExecutor in interface IExecutors
        Returns:
        A scheduled executor service

      • getFileDeleteExecutor

        Description copied from interface: IExecutors

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        A scheduled executor service
